title: The Ring Bearer's Trial
description: Gandalf tasks you with proving your worth as the ring bearer by defeating orcs that have been sighted nearby.

offer.speaker: Gandalf
offer.text: Frodo, your journey as the ring bearer will be fraught with danger. Before we continue to Mordor, you must prove your strength.

offer.speaker: Gandalf
offer.text: A band of orcs has been spotted near the edge of the forest. Defeat them to prove your resolve.

choices.text: I will do as you ask, Gandalf.

inProgress.speaker: Gandalf
inProgress.text: The orcs still threaten our path. You must deal with them before we can continue.

completion.speaker: Gandalf
completion.text: Well done, Frodo! You have proven yourself capable. The ring could not have found a more worthy bearer.

completion.speaker: Gandalf
completion.text: Take these supplies. You will need them for the long journey ahead.
